messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near /b/Station, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to /b/Station. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Cecil Quja (Assistant)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Reply to this or your mother will die in her sleep.</font>
